context.description: Select a CORBA IDL file to import Select a CORBA IDL file to import into a message set. The CORBA IDL file can be from a workspace or an external location.
Validation messages The following validation messages were returned after validating the selected CORBA IDL file.
File conflict detected The files shown in the table conflict with existing files in the message set. To continue, either rename or overwrite the files without grey boxes beside them.
CORBA IDL File Usage To configure the CORBA nodes with an imported CORBA IDL file, drag the file from the CORBA IDLs folder into the Message Flow editor.

topic.label: Developing a message flow with a CORBARequest node

context.description: CORBA IDL interface and operation selection dialog When a CORBA IDL file is dropped into the Message Flow editor, this selection dialog will appear only if there is more than one interface with more than one operation. Typing a filter expression will change the number of interfaces listed. Selecting an interface will refresh the list of operations.

Interface selection dialog Lists the available CORBA IDL interfaces for a given CORBA IDL file. Typing a filter expression will change the number of interfaces listed. Select an interface from the list and press the OK button to update the 'Interface name' property.
